text:
Zeppelin | Sr. Android Engineer | Tokyo | ONSITE | https://open.talentio.com/1/c/zeppelin-inc/requisitions/deta...

Happy new year!

Zeppelin has a small engineering team in Tokyo and we build Feelit, a video news and entertainment app. There's an opening for a second Android Engineer in our Tokyo HQ.

Feelit is a playground for our computer vision research like video deduplication, visual understanding, video search, and content moderation.

We've got other open positions at our Tokyo HQ, please visit https://www.zeppelin.co.jp/join/ for more details.
